com.radiotelescope.controller

Class ExceptionLogger

  • com.radiotelescope.controller.ExceptionLogger

  • public class ExceptionLogger

    System-wide component that will handle any exception experienced strictly within the radio telescope application (see 'basePackages') so the front-end can properly handle whenever an exception occurs. This will also log the exception so that admins can see that it occurred.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ExceptionLogger(Logger logger)
      System-wide component that will handle any exception experienced strictly within the radio telescope application (see 'basePackages') so the front-end can properly handle whenever an exception occurs. This will also log the exception so that admins can see that it occurred.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Result logException(java.lang.Exception exception, javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response)
      Method that will handle any exceptions. Creates a log of the exception and returns something understandable to the end-user. Please note that normally, when an unknown exception occurs, the front-end cannot uniformly handle it, and this will allow that

    • Constructor Detail

      • ExceptionLogger

        public ExceptionLogger(Logger logger)

        System-wide component that will handle any exception experienced strictly within the radio telescope application (see 'basePackages') so the front-end can properly handle whenever an exception occurs. This will also log the exception so that admins can see that it occurred.

        Parameters:

        logger - the class Logger service
